messages.name: anosleepbel
messages.content:
Okay, so I got an adhd diagnosis, thank you guys for your help - now does anyone know how get adhd meds aka actually treated?

I do wanna do it properly with a psychiatrist but public insurance appointments are nowhere to be found?
I looked at 116117, doctolib and Jameda
I also looked it up on Reddit and it seems pretty hopeless cause they need to be specialized for adhd on top?
I even got the urgency code 

Prio 1: how do I get vyvanse asap in the meantime? (I already tried it and it helped like day and night + talked about it with my GP. I also nerded myself so deep into the topic that I feel confident to bridge the gap until a psychiatrist appointment myself) (or something similar if not possible) 
Prio 2: how do I get an appointment at all? (Ideally <1 year‚Ä¶.)

Does anyone know anything / know where to ask? 
Feeling pretty overwhelmed right now, as the adhd is also impacting my ability to work at all, so that‚Äôs super stressful

messages.name: Britta
messages.content:
Go to a "psychiatrische Institutsambulanz" (Pia) at a hospital close to you. I know someone who got his first ritalin prescription at the PIA linked below. But it might depend on where you live.I think ritalin cannot be prescribed by every Hausarzt. Of course that's not the only treatment option though 

https://www.alexianer-berlin-hedwigkliniken.de/st-hedwig-krankenhaus/leistungen/ambulante-behandlung/psychiatrische-institutsambulanzen-pia/psychiatrische-institutsambulanz-pia-im-josefshaus

messages.name: AlexPooPip
messages.content:
Last reminder: Burner Sauna - Zum schwitzenden B√§ren tonight at 6 at Studio DB, Wedding. Don‚Äòt forget to bring a funny ‚ÄûWichtel present‚Äú if you want to take part in the big Wichtel Battle. Also our hots let‚Äòs you know: there will be festive food at a fair price: French cheese, oysters and bubbles.
And not to forget: Agro Yoga for all levels

messages.name: AlexPooPip
messages.content:
Yes, the rumours are true: in 2025 "Zum Brennenden B√§ren" strikes  back!!!
After a three-year hibernation, ZZB (Burning Bear) is back‚Äîand this time, it‚Äôs double the fun! In 2025, we‚Äôre thrilled to bring you two events: a winter burn from March 13‚Äì16 at the beloved Schloss Beesenstedt üè∞ and a summer burn in mid-September at our sparkling new treasure ü§´

‚ÄºÔ∏èYes, we found it: our new home‚ÄºÔ∏è
Our new location which we will reveal soon is the uncut rough diamond üíé we‚Äôve spent years searching for! It‚Äôs a place full of history. It has trizillion tons of space to realize our wildest dreams. By 2026 the new location will also be winter-ready, so we plan to make it our winter residency. However, we want to show how colourful, creative and wild we are. This is why we are doing our first event in September and we really need you to join forces.

This project only works if we collaborate like burners do and we are ready to invest a lot of love ‚ù§Ô∏è and resources into this project. Soon you will be able to pre-register and start working on whatever project you come up with.
Here are some teasers before the great reveal. An old prison in the basement?! Check! Rooms even more impressive than Beesenstedt‚Äôs ballroom!? Check! A lake?! Check! Light-flooded rooms?! Check! We could go on like forever, or in short: we‚Äòre in love ü•∞

Winter is too cold ü•∂ and September is too far?!
We got you covered. So, what‚Äôs a bear üêª to do in the meantime? Hibernate for another winter? No way! After much thoughtful discussion and a democratic vote, the majority decided: we‚Äôre heading back to Schloss Beesenstedt - our cozy but imperfect den under the big chandeliers.
Yes, the reasons we left haven‚Äôt changed. It‚Äôs pricey, and not everyone loves the "plug-and-play" vibe. We‚Äôve heard those voices, loud and clear. But no other venue gives us the creative freedom to make winter magic quite like Beesenstedt. Sure, we said: it‚Äòs over. We said: ‚ÄûCiao Cacao‚Äú and ‚Äûlast dance‚Äú, but we got an offer we could not refuse.

And be honest: who of you never had sex with their ex?
Let‚Äôs work together to make this burn as inclusive as possible.
 Because whether you‚Äôre a grizzly üêª , a panda üêº , or a teddy üß∏ , everyone deserves to experience the Burn‚Äôs warmth and joy.  The details: Our membership lottery kicks off in the first weeks of January, so don‚Äôt wait‚Äîsign up now for your membership. The registration form will remain open until December 31st. One last hurrah in Beesenstedt, and then‚Äîonward to new horizons! The adventure is calling, and we can‚Äôt wait to share it with all of you. #PawPower is back!

messages.name: Al√© Unel√©n Felicitas
messages.content:
Hello Lovely beings! 
My name is Felicitas and I‚Äôm a LomiLomi practitioner (among other thingsüòÜ) I am currently learning Tantra Massage and I wish to explore more the RECEIVING part. I know I can be very good at constructive feedback and I‚Äôm looking for people who would like to practice with me in exchange of a radical honest feedback and a home made surprising chocolateüòãI also have access to a praxis and I can take care of the cost of the space.
I‚Äôll be in Berlin until the 13/1 or from 30/03.

messages.name: kitkatberlin
messages.content:
Special:¬†‚ÄûPiepShow - Berlin's happiest & most colourful QUEER TECHNO RAVE for everyone who loves to dance in tolerance!‚Äú 5 dancefloors, 14 DJs, all areas open, incl. Prisma! Many play-areas & darkrooms throughout the entire club. Drag cabaret floor (performances & comedy) with CoCo Kitsch and Raven Van Krueger. Shibari-Show by Merlin. Veggie buffet, Candy-Shop & Cocktail bar. Shop/Accessoires by Lisa Majun. Colourful decorations & cute piepers everywhere. 14 hours of happy pieping: ‚ÄûLet's end this year with a PIEP! We can't wait to rave with YOU!‚Äú <3

Every Friday & Saturday the ‚ÄûCome Together‚Äú-Preparty @ 8 P.M.
(English version: see down below for the Saturday night)

Liebe G√§ste & Freunde der Nacht!
Seit Juni √∂ffnen wir unsere T√ºren am Wochenende bereits um 20 Uhr, auch am Freitag! Von 20 bis 22 Uhr wollen wir leicht & locker in den Abend einsteigen: Freunde treffen, chillen am Pool, Zeit zu plaudern und f√ºr ausf√ºhrliche Gespr√§che. Eine Bar- und Strandatmosph√§re schwebt uns vor: Ein ‚ÄûCome Together‚Äú vor der Party!

Als angenehmen Nebeneffekt erhoffen wir, dass sich die ankommenden G√§ste besser √ºber die Nacht verteilen und sich dadurch die uns√§glichen Wartezeiten in der Schlange elementar verk√ºrzen. Oder im besten Fall erst gar keine Schlange entsteht. W√§re das nicht wunderbar?

Aus aktuellem Anlass m√∂chten wir euch auch alle bitten, immer daran zu denken, dass es Nachbarn gibt, die Nachts ihre Ruhe wollen. Einige Beschwerden liegen vor, deshalb haben uns die zust√§ndigen √Ñmter kontaktiert. Wir m√ºssen au√üerhalb des Clubs definitiv leiser werden, bitte helft uns dabei! Knebel m√∂chten wir ungern verteilen. :-)

Der Dresscode gilt selbstverst√§ndlich ab 20 Uhr, ebenso ist der normale Obolus zu entrichten.

Let`s dance & play on!....Eure KitKat-Crew
Dresscode:¬†Kinky or fetish (black or colourful), sporty (sportswear + sneakers), creative (sexy + imaginative), costumes. Regular jeans or T-shirts are usually no piep-outfits.

Sa.
28.¬†Dez
ab 19h
Tango Rouge at CarneBall Bizarre
(Im 5. Raum, im Basement)
Special:¬†19:00 Entrance Buffet. 19:30 Classes in Argentine Tango: No experience and no partner needed ‚Äì come alone, as a couple or bring some friends! 2 Classes, Beginners Class: Introduction to Tango. Dramatic & playful figures. 21:30 Tango Party in Salon Rouge. Live music and Performances all night long. Entry from 19:00/Einlass ab 19:00 Uhr. The entry is valid for the whole Saturday night in all areas of KitKatClub.
Dresscode:¬†Playful, kinky, fetish, carnival, crazy, sexy, extremely elegant Tango. Casual dress = no entry!
